trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>hendelse når en rad Oppdater-knappen, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen oppdaterer raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte oppdateringen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewUpdateEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewUpdateEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for den gjeldende raden og å angi at oppdateringen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the GridViewUpdateEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte oppdateringen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for GridViewUpdateEventArgs-objektet til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>samlinger, eventuelt før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig måte å bruke disse samlingene som HTML-kode verdiene som er oppgitt av brukeren før de er lagret i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: Dette bidrar til å forhindre skriptet innsetting angrep.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewUpdateEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av GridViewUpdateEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> class using the specified row index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>klasse ved hjelp av den angitte radindeksen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>|The value contained in the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>| Verdien i den `rowIndex` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of field name/value pairs that represent the primary key of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for feltet Navn/verdi-par som representerer primærnøkkelen for raden som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is set, use the Keys property (dictionary) to access the value of the primary key in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen er angitt, bruke egenskapen nøkler (ordliste) til å få tilgang til den primære nøkkelen i raden for å oppdatere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To access the values of the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property contains the updated values, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property contains the original values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>egenskapen inneholder de oppdaterte verdiene, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>egenskapen inneholder de opprinnelige verdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys dictionary is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nøkler ordlisten automatisk fylles ut med navn/verdi-par med feltet eller feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If multiple fields form the primary key, a separate entry is added to the Keys dictionary for each key field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere felt utgjør primærnøkkel, legges en egen oppføring nøkler stavemåten for hvert felt.

trans-unit.source: To determine the name of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the Keys dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på et felt i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekt i ordlisten nøkler.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for et nøkkelfelt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object containing field name/value pairs that represent the primary key of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet som inneholder feltet Navn/verdi-par som representerer primærnøkkelen for raden som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary containing the revised values of the non-key field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste som inneholder endrede verdiene i ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par i raden å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Use the NewValues property (dictionary) to access the values of the revised non-key fields in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen NewValues (ordliste) å få tilgang til verdiene i de endrede uten nøkkel-feltene i rad å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The primary key field or fields are not included in this dictionary.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Felt eller felt er ikke inkludert i ordlisten.

trans-unit.source: To access the values of the primary key field or fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til verdiene i den primære nøkkelfeltet eller felt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the original values of the non-key fields in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til de opprinnelige verdiene ikke er en nøkkel-felt i raden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NewValues property is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the revised non-key fields in the row.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen NewValues fylles automatisk med navn/verdi-par med de endrede uten nøkkel-feltene i raden.

trans-unit.source: A separate entry is added to the NewValues property for each non-key field in the row.
trans-unit.target: En egen oppføring legges til egenskapen NewValues for hvert felt som ikke er en nøkkel i raden.

trans-unit.source: To determine the field name of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the NewValues dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på en oppføring i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekt i ordlisten NewValues.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for en oppføring, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object containing the revised values of the non-key field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet som inneholder endrede verdiene i ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par i raden å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary containing the original field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste som inneholder de opprinnelige feltet Navn/verdi-par i raden å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Use the OldValues property (dictionary) to access the original values of the fields in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen OldValues (ordliste) til å få tilgang til de opprinnelige verdiene med felt i raden for å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: This dictionary contains all fields in the row except the key fields.
trans-unit.target: Denne ordlisten inneholder alle felt i raden unntatt nøkkelfeltene.

trans-unit.source: The key fields are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelfeltene som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can access the key fields of the row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du har tilgang til nøkkelfeltene radverdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the revised values of the non-key fields in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til endrede verdiene ikke er en nøkkel-felt i raden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OldValues property is automatically populated with the original values of all the field name/value pairs in the row.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen OldValues automatisk fylles ut med de opprinnelige verdiene for alle felt navn/verdi-par i raden.

trans-unit.source: A separate entry is added to the OldValues property for each field in the row.
trans-unit.target: En egen oppføring legges til egenskapen OldValues for hvert felt i raden.

trans-unit.source: To determine the field name of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the OldValues dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på en oppføring i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>objekt i ordlisten OldValues.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for en oppføring, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object that contains the original values of the field name/value pairs in the row to update.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objekt som inneholder de opprinnelige verdiene for feltet Navn/verdi-par i raden for å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen i raden som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen i raden som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: The row index is often used to retrieve the corresponding row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, which allows you to access the row's properties.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen ofte brukes til å hente den tilsvarende raden fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, som gir deg tilgang til den raden egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being updated.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som skal oppdateres.
